Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL of LAW , in force until DATE , stipulated that , subject to any contrary legal provision , the purchaser acquired the right of ownership to property from the time of transfer . As regards real estate , the transfer agreement had to be registered in ORG and the time of registration was regarded as the time from which the acquirer acquired title to the property .
